slide1.title: Welcome to VectorFi
slide1.text: Meet Vectra, your personal AI financial coach. You can ask Vectra anything about your finances and she will give you clear, actionable steps to guide you.

slide2.title: Connect Securely with Plaid
slide2.text: Link your bank accounts in seconds with Plaid technology trusted by users around the world.

slide3.title: Your Spending, Explained
slide3.text: Vectra turns your transactions into clear, actionable insights - not just data, but smart insights you can use today.

slide4.title: Save for What Matters
slide4.text: Set goals and and get actionable tips to help you reach them.

slide5.title: Forecast Your Finances
slide5.text: Manage planned income and expenses and update your budget as you spend.

slide6.title: Your Security Comes First
slide6.text: Biometric login + bank-grade encryption keep your data safe at all times.

intro.ai_disclaimer: ⚠️ AI advice is for informational purposes only. Consult qualified professionals for financial decisions.

step1.title: Plan Your Spending
step1.description: Add recurring income and bills ahead of time. When your bank confirms them, we’ll mark them paid automatically.

step2.title: Stay on Track
step2.description: Set limits for food, entertainment, and other variable expense categories to keep spending in check.

step3.title: Set Goals
step3.description: Pick something fun (like a Spain trip ✈️) and set a target date.

step4.title: Ask Vectra
step4.description: Add your income and expenses (bills), then tap the green chat bubble to ask your first question!

help_support.subtitle: Get help and find answers

add_transaction.question: How do I add my first transaction?
add_transaction.answer: Tap the '+' button on the Dashboard or go to the Transactions tab and tap 'Add Transaction'. Fill in the amount, category, description, and date, then save.

generate_plans.question: How do I generate financial plans with Vectra?
generate_plans.answer: Go to the AI Financial Advisor tab and tap 'Generate Plan'. Vectra will analyze your financial data and create personalized recommendations for budgeting, saving, investing, and debt management. You can customize the plan based on your goals and preferences.

setup_budget.question: How do I set up a budget?
setup_budget.answer: Go to the Budget tab. You can add income sources, fixed expenses, and variable expenses. The app will automatically calculate your remaining budget.

share_finances.question: Can I share my finances with family members?
share_finances.answer: Yes! Use the Shared Finance feature to create groups with family members. You can share transactions, assets, and debts while maintaining privacy.

set_goals.question: How do I set financial goals?
set_goals.answer: Go to the Goals tab and tap 'Add Goal'. Set a target amount, monthly contribution, and target date. Track your progress visually.

data_security.question: Is my financial data secure?
data_security.answer: Absolutely! We use industry-standard encryption and Firebase security. Your data is private and only accessible to you and your shared group members.

export_data.question: How do I export my data?
export_data.answer: Go to Settings → Privacy & Security → Export My Data. You'll receive an email with your financial data within 24 hours.

offline_use.question: Can I use the app offline?
offline_use.answer: The app requires an internet connection to sync your data with our secure servers. However, you can view recently loaded data when offline.

change_password.question: How do I change my password?
change_password.answer: Go to Settings → Privacy & Security → Change Password. Enter your current password and set a new one.

help_support.emergency_description: For urgent issues or account problems, contact us immediately.

ai_chat.initial_message:
Hi! 👋 I'm Vectra, your AI financial advisor.

Ask me anything about your money:

🚗 "What kind of car can I afford?"
🏠 "Can I buy a house this year?"
💳 "Should I pay off debt or save?"
📱 "Is this subscription worth it?"
💰 "How much should I save each month?"

What's on your mind?

privacy_security.permanent_account_deletion_message:
This action CANNOT be undone. The following will be PERMANENTLY deleted:

• All financial transactions
• All bank account connections
• All assets and debts
• All financial goals
• All budget settings
• All shared finance groups
• All AI chat history
• All app settings and preferences
• Your entire user profile

This data will be completely removed from our servers and cannot be recovered.
privacy_security.final_warning_message:
This is your LAST CHANCE to cancel. Once you proceed:

✅ Your account will be PERMANENTLY deleted
✅ ALL your financial data will be GONE FOREVER
✅ You will lose access to ALL your information
✅ This action CANNOT be reversed

Are you absolutely certain you want to proceed?

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Learn more about VectorFi
about.app_tagline: Take control of your financial future
about.description_1: VectorFi is your comprehensive personal finance companion, designed to help you track expenses, manage budgets, set financial goals, and build wealth with confidence.
about.description_2: Built with modern technology and security in mind, we prioritize your financial data privacy while providing powerful tools to achieve your financial dreams.

about.copyright_message: Made with passion for financial empowerment.
